page.title: 17PLACES OF INTEREST
page.content: The old railway line runs along the eastern side of our block.The station was situated at STRATA FLORIDA just off the north-eastern junction of our map.It was closed in the mid fifties. In SWYDDFFYNNON there is a war memorial on the village square,and also a smithy and old mill.One of the villagers,Mr. Tom Davies remembers being an apprentice there over 50 years ago.If you go in a south-easterly direction towards Ynys Y Berfedd you will reach CORS CARON ,famous the World over as a nature reserve.Another more recent place of interest is the private home set up by Mrs. Price of Llys Yr Awel for the elderly.In 1985 for the first time ever Swyddffynnon entered the BEST KEPT VILLAGE competition-we did not win,but we could be a place of interest of our own if we do win ever.
